verses.verse: <S%H4100>How<s%> have you <S%H5826>helped<s%> him that is <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3581>power?<s%> how <S%H3467>save<s%> you the <S%H2220>arm<s%> that has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5797>strength?<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> have you <S%H3289>counceled<s%> him that has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom?<s%> and how have you <S%H7230>plentifully<s%> <S%H3045>declared<s%> the thing as it is?
To <S%H4310>whom<s%> have you <S%H5046>uttered<s%> <S%H4405>words?<s%> and <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H5397>spirit<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> from you?
<S%H7496>Dead<s%> things are <S%H2342>formed<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and the <S%H7934>inhabitants<s%> thereof.
He <S%H5186>stretches<s%> out the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H8414>empty<s%> <S%H8414>place,<s%> and <S%H8518>hangs<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> on <S%H1099>nothing.<s%>
He <S%H6887>binds<s%> up the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in his thick <S%H5645>clouds;<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is not <S%H1234>rent<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> them.
He <S%H270>holds<s%> back the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and <S%H6576>spreads<s%> his <S%H6051>cloud<s%> on it.
He has <S%H2328>compassed<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> with <S%H2706>bounds,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H216>day<s%> and <S%H2822>night<s%> come to an <S%H8503>end.<s%>
The <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7322>tremble<s%> and are <S%H8539>astonished<s%> at his <S%H1606>reproof.<s%>
He <S%H7280>divides<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with his <S%H3581>power,<s%> and by his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> he <S%H4272>smites<s%> through the <S%H7293>proud.<s%>
By his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> he has <S%H8235>garnished<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H2342>formed<s%> the <S%H1281>crooked<s%> <S%H5175>serpent.<s%>

<S%H2005>See,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are <S%H7098>parts<s%> of his <S%H1870>ways:<s%> but <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H8102>little<s%> a <S%H1697>portion<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> of him? but the <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of his <S%H1369>power<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H995>understand?<s%>
